videos.description: 1H (15:21) XAV J.P. Macura made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Edmond Sumner.
videos.headline: Macura hits deep 3-pointer

videos.description: 1H (13:36) XAV J.P. Macura made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Trevon Bluiett.
videos.headline: Macura goes back-to-back with long range 3-pointers

videos.description: 1H (12:59) XAV J.P. Macura made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Trevon Bluiett.
videos.headline: Macura goes for three 3-pointers in a row

videos.description: 1H (10:49) CLEM Gabe DeVoe made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Marcquise Reed.
videos.headline: DeVoe cuts into Xavier lead with corner 3-pointer

videos.description: 1H (8:46) XAV Malcolm Bernard made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Trevon Bluiett.
videos.headline: Bernard knocks down another 3-pointer for Xavier

videos.description: 1H (5:46) CLEM Avry Holmes made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Marcquise Reed.
videos.headline: Clemson's Avry Holmes adds another 3-pointer

videos.description: 1H (3:48) XAV J.P. Macura made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Edmond Sumner.
videos.headline: Macura hits one more 3-pointer for Xavier

videos.description: 2H (17:51) CLEM Jaron Blossomgame made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Donte Grantham.
videos.headline: Clemson's Blossomgame wide open in corner for 3-pointer

videos.description: 2H (15:12) CLEM Jaron Blossomgame made Dunk. Assisted by Sidy Djitte.
videos.headline: Blossomgame makes great dunk from under basket

videos.description: 2H (11:17) CLEM Donte Grantham made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Avry Holmes.
videos.headline: Donte Grantham cuts it closer for Clemson with another 3-pointer

videos.description: 2H (8:19) CLEM Jaron Blossomgame made Dunk. Assisted by Donte Grantham.
videos.headline: Grantham and Blossomgame connect on alley-oop dunk

videos.description: 2H (2:51) XAV Edmond Sumner made Dunk. Assisted by J.P. Macura.
videos.headline: Sumner throws down two-handed dunk

videos.description: 2H (2:14) XAV J.P. Macura made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Edmond Sumner.
videos.headline: J.P. Macura knocks down the 3-pointer

videos.description: With Xavier just trying to run out the clock, RaShid Gaston gets left all alone and finishes off the win for the Musketeers with a huge two-hand dunk.
videos.headline: Gaston punctuates Xavier's win with massive dunk
